participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Playful and imaginative, with a love for animals and dolls.
participant_1.background: i have a pet turtle. i like to play with my dolls. i don't pick up my toys. my best friend lives next door.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Reflective and resilient, coping with challenges while trying to find stability in life.
participant_2.background: i'm a recovering alcoholic. i grew up on a farm. i now live in the city. i'm a 45 year old male. i take many medications and some of them make me see things.
